text: Kuma idan cuta ta shafi mutum, sai ya kiraye Mu, yana (kwance) ga sashensa ko kuwa zaune, ko kuwa a tsaye. To, a lokacin, da Muka kuranye cutar daga gare shi, sai ya shuɗe kamar ɗai bai kiraye Mu ba zuwa ga wata cuta wadda ta shafe shi. Kamar wannan ne aka ƙawata ga maɓannata, abin da suka kasance suna aikatawa
